All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
Base
This is a base wrapper class that wraps selenium's main actions into a single class for easy access and segmentation of the code.
CategoryPage
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.
ContactFormTest
This class isolates the contact form tests
ContactPage
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.

This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.
NavigationHeader
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.
ReportToPDFConverter
This class prepares the outcome of the test suite in a way that can be read by the people that needs to read it
SearchPage
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.
SearchTest
This class isolates the search tests
ShoppingCartNavigationWidgetTest
This class isolates the shopping cart widget tests
ShoppingCartPage
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.
WebPageVisualTest
This class isolates all the test related to the visuals of the webpage
